meeting_info.organization: Skillman Corridor TIF District Board of Directors
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6DN Conference Room and Videoconference

presenters: Dorcy Clark, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development
Patrick Blaydes, Chief Planner, Department of Planning and Development
Susan Morgan, Chair, Skillman Corridor TIF District Board of Directors

agenda_items.title: Call meeting to order and declare a quorum is established.
Public comments pertaining to agenda items 4 through 9.
Nominate and elect a Vice Chair for the Board of Directors
Review and consider the Meeting Record of the December 1, 2023 Skillman Corridor TIF District Board Meeting.
agenda_items.presenter: Dorcy Clark, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Review and consider the Skillman Corridor TIF District Annual Report for FY 2023-2024.
agenda_items.presenter: Dorcy Clark, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development
agenda_items.action_required: Approve and forward a recommendation of approval to City Council

agenda_items.title: Review the 2014 LBJ Skillman Planning Initiative Study.
agenda_items.presenter: Patrick Blaydes, Chief Planner, Department of Planning and Development

agenda_items.title: Review the Skillman Corridor Streetscape Master Plan.
agenda_items.presenter: Susan Morgan, Chair, Skillman Corridor TIF District Board of Directors

agenda_items.title: Review and consider a quarterly regular meeting schedule for the Skillman Corridor TIF District Board of Directors for calendar year 2025.
agenda_items.presenter: Dorcy Clark, Senior Manager, Office of Economic Development
